choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:


Subject: Resignation from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to inform you that I have decided to resign from my position as [Your Job Title] at [Company Name]. My last day of work will be [Date].

I want to express my gratitude for the opportunities and experiences that I have gained while working at [Company Name]. I have learned a lot during my time here, and I am grateful for the support and guidance provided by my colleagues and superiors.

I have decided to resign due to personal reasons that I believe will benefit me and my family. I want to ensure that I leave on good terms and that any outstanding issues are resolved before I depart.

Thank you again for the support and guidance provided during my time at [Company Name]. I wish everyone at the company all the best in the future.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
